(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN For)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ next) (NN poll)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, For-1)
det(poll-4, the-2)
amod(poll-4, next-3)
pobj(For-1, poll-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB try)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB find)
              (PRT (RP out))
              (SBAR (IN if)
                (S
                  (NP (RB there) (WDT which))
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN number) (NN one))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(try-3, we-1)
aux(try-3, will-2)
root(ROOT-0, try-3)
aux(find-5, to-4)
xcomp(try-3, find-5)
prt(find-5, out-6)
mark(one-13, if-7)
advmod(which-9, there-8)
nsubj(one-13, which-9)
cop(one-13, is-10)
det(one-13, the-11)
nn(one-13, number-12)
advcl(find-5, one-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ favorite))
      (NN hawker))
    (VP (VBZ dish)
      (PP (IN amongst)
        (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS readers))))
    (. .)))


advmod(favorite-2, most-1)
amod(hawker-3, favorite-2)
nsubj(dish-4, hawker-3)
root(ROOT-0, dish-4)
prep(dish-4, amongst-5)
poss(readers-7, our-6)
pobj(amongst-5, readers-7)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN Since)
    (S
      (NP (EX there))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (ADVP (RB so))
        (NP (JJ many) (NNS dishes)))
      (, ,))))


mark(are-3, Since-1)
expl(are-3, there-2)
root(ROOT-0, are-3)
advmod(are-3, so-4)
amod(dishes-6, many-5)
nsubj(are-3, dishes-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB like)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (RB all)
          (VP (VB nominate)
            (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ favorite) (NN fare))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(like-3, I-1)
aux(like-3, would-2)
root(ROOT-0, like-3)
nsubj(nominate-6, you-4)
advmod(nominate-6, all-5)
ccomp(like-3, nominate-6)
poss(fare-9, your-7)
amod(fare-9, favorite-8)
dobj(nominate-6, fare-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN From)
      (NP (RB there)))
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB narrow)
        (PRT (RP down))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ top) (CD 10) (NNS nominees)))
        (SBAR (IN before)
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBP start)
              (NP (DT the) (NNS polls)))))))
    (. .)))


prep(narrow-5, From-1)
pobj(From-1, there-2)
nsubj(narrow-5, we-3)
aux(narrow-5, will-4)
root(ROOT-0, narrow-5)
prt(narrow-5, down-6)
prep(narrow-5, to-7)
det(nominees-11, the-8)
amod(nominees-11, top-9)
num(nominees-11, 10-10)
pobj(to-7, nominees-11)
mark(start-14, before-12)
nsubj(start-14, we-13)
advcl(narrow-5, start-14)
det(polls-16, the-15)
dobj(start-14, polls-16)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN OK)
      (NP (NNS people)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, OK-1)
pobj(OK-1, people-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB please))
    (VP (VB write)
      (PRT (RP in))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB nominate)
            (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ favorite) (NN hawker) (NN dish))))))
    (. !)))


discourse(write-2, please-1)
root(ROOT-0, write-2)
prt(write-2, in-3)
aux(nominate-5, to-4)
xcomp(write-2, nominate-5)
poss(dish-9, your-6)
amod(dish-9, favorite-7)
nn(dish-9, hawker-8)
dobj(nominate-5, dish-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD may)
      (VP (VB nominate)
        (PRT (RP up))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (CD 3) (NNS dishes)))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(nominate-3, You-1)
aux(nominate-3, may-2)
root(ROOT-0, nominate-3)
prt(nominate-3, up-4)
prep(nominate-3, to-5)
num(dishes-7, 3-6)
pobj(to-5, dishes-7)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (PRP$ My) (JJ top) (NNP 3))
    (VP (VBP are))
    (: :)))


poss(3-3, My-1)
amod(3-3, top-2)
root(ROOT-0, 3-3)
dep(3-3, are-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Hokkien))
    (VP (VBZ Mee))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(Mee-2, Hokkien-1)
root(ROOT-0, Mee-2)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Satay)
    (CC and)
    (NNP Char) (NNP Siew) (. !)))


nn(Siew-4, Satay-1)
cc(Satay-1, and-2)
conj(Satay-1, Char-3)
root(ROOT-0, Siew-4)
